page.title: 17News
page.content:
{The Accident
It was the first day back at school after the Whit Holidays. I had just got back from dinner when Graeme, my friend, ran into school and said Kit, James, and Robert had all been on the same bike and had fallen off it. They had to go to hospital. James had a little cut on the head and Kit's nose was bleeding and Robert had a big cut on his forehead. Then we had to go into the infants because Mr.Kirk was phoning people up to tell them about the accident. Robert had to stay at hospital over night because he had concussion. Kit had to go to the dentist the next day because he had chipped his teeth when he had fallen off the bike.
